items.preText: Guptill takes guard. Mashrafe with the ball. 5.35pm These were the kind of totals Bangladesh managed in New Zealand lately, but there they had been jolted by early wickets and 232 and 226 were respectable recoveries. The problem for them is that New Zealand romped to wins on both those occasions with Martin Guptill, who brilliantly ran Mushfiqur Rahim out here, blasting back to back centuries then. He fancies the Bangladesh attack, averaging in excess of 60. The New Zealand openers made light work of a small chase against Sri Lanka, while they're chasing a few more here, the odds are heavily in New Zealand's favour. Not quite 500-1 but the bookmakers, according to bet365.com are offering 5-1, which is some indication of the work ahead of Bangladesh. But the pitch showed signs of holding up which should bring the likes of Mustafizur Rahman with his cutters and the spinners into play.
items.text: short of a length on middle, just gentle pace, no bounce and Guptill pulls hard in front of square, not perfectly timed but it races away to the deep midwicket fence, nevertheless
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Guptill, FOUR runs

items.text: another shortish delivery on middle, a more controlled shot on this occasion, keeps it along the ground and helps it along through midwicket for two
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Guptill, 2 runs

items.text: length, angled in, nudged to short fine-leg's left for a single
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: length and angled in from around the wicket, punched back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Munro, no run

items.text: length outside off, pushed to cover followed by a loud call of no
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Munro, no run

items.text: length, angled in, opens the face and runs it to point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Munro, no run

items.preText:
Spin

Towhidur Razzak: "Considering the slower than expected nature of the track, I think the Mustafiz and Mashrafe would play a key role in this match. "
items.text: tossed up on off, Guptill goes down on one knee, gets under it and launches it high and handsome over wide long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Guptill, SIX runs

items.text: slightly shorter on off, pushed to long-on for one
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: full toss, angled in, Munro looks to whip it away to the leg side but finds midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Munro, no run

items.text: slightly quicker and flatter, angled in again, inside edge back on to the pad
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Munro, no run

items.text: fired in on leg stump, Munro is stuck on the pad but he didn't plant it across
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Munro, no run

items.text: full toss on off, pushed to long-off for one
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Munro, 1 run

items.text: length, angled in, tickled to short fine-leg's right and well stopped by the fielder diving to his right
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Munro, 1 run

items.text: short again and that's imperious! Just sat up and asked to be hit and Guptill obliged, hammering it in front of square on two bounces
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Guptill, FOUR runs

items.text: short again, slightly miscue this time from Guptill as he goes for the pull again, lost control with his bottom hand but falls short of the deep square leg fielder
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: length on off, pushed to mid-off
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Munro, no run

items.text: length outside off, not a lot of width but Munro slashes it away with an open face, beats point and it races to the fence
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Munro, FOUR runs

items.text: slower one on off, defended
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Munro, no run

items.text: full and flat on middle, Guptill goes for the sweep and connects well, takes it from the stumps which is slightly risky should he miss but controlled it nicely for four
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Guptill, FOUR runs

items.text: full on middle, defended
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Guptill, no run

items.text: shorter, straighter one, defended back again
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Guptill, no run

items.text: full toss, dances down the track and drills it straight to mid-off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Guptill, no run

items.text: full on middle, pushed to long-on for one
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: length, angled in, flat again, inside edge back onto the pad again from Munro
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Munro, no run

items.text: full on off, pushed towards cover and they come through for quick single
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Guptill, 1 run
